Hi Jamie,

Sure, we have updated the live site. 
https://visitlatitude25.com.au/properties/

Regarding the meta "New Built Homes" at the moment there is no property set with that data so nothing will show up when you select it in the filter.

Hi Joel,

One last change before making these updates live.

The decimal places need to be removed from the tile view.

Please make these changes live when complete.

Many thanks,
Jamie




Kind regards,

Jamie Shek
Director, Maker's Mark Creative



// M 0423 592 912
// E jamie@makersmarkcreative.com.au
// A Level 1, 616 Balcombe Road, Black Rock, 3193 VIC

Hi Jamie,

Sure, all good now. just let us know when we need to push it to live. 
https://staging-visitlatitude25.kinsta.com/properties/lot-109/
https://staging-visitlatitude25.kinsta.com/properties/

Hi Joel,

Green is fine for now. We might change it at a later date.

One last change please?

On the property page the label should read NEW BUILT HOME rather than NEW BUILD HOMES.

When thats updated I'll get the staging changes approved before going live.



Kind regards,

Jamie Shek
Director, Maker's Mark Creative



// M 0423 592 912
// E jamie@makersmarkcreative.com.au

Hi Jamie,

Sure, we have updated the shortcodes.
https://staging-visitlatitude25.kinsta.com/properties/
https://staging-visitlatitude25.kinsta.com/properties/lot-109/

Let me know if this is ok? and also what color do you want for the 'new built home' label at them moment its the same with the new release which is green.

Hi Joel,

Thanks!

I'm not seeing the labels for New Built Homes. See screenshots attached.

Can we left align New Built Homes rather than the right alight on the tile?


Kind regards,

Jamie Shek
Director, Maker's Mark Creative



// M 0423 592 912
// E jamie@makersmarkcreative.com.au
// A Level 1, 616 Balcombe Road, Black Rock, 3193 VIC

Hi Jamie,

Sure, we have updated the filter stuff. Let me know if this is ok?
https://staging-visitlatitude25.kinsta.com/properties/

Hi Heath,

Functionaly-wise, it looks and works great! Good job. I've got some tweaks to make.


  1. Filter Criteria: Please remove Sold and Deposit Taken form the filter. Properties with these meta tags should still be be shown when the list is unfiltered.

  2. Can we please add a new meta tag called New Built Homes and add that to the filter? Can we also create a tile label for it and align it to the left rather than the right? The property page itself will also need the label indicator included as per the others. FYI, New Built Homes are different to New Release.

  3. Properties with the meta tag Deposit Taken have lost their orange label.

  4. Can we please updated the UI so that the entire property tile is clickable? Currently only the tile image and tile button links to the page.

  5. Can we please update the content in the top section to include the new text and images as per this page - https://staging-visitlatitude25.kinsta.com/properties-stage-1b/

  6. Can we please remove the hyphen from 2-Bedrooms, 3-Bedrooms etc.

  7. Can we please include additional filter criteria for Multi Purpose Rooms

  8. Please remove SECOND RELEASE block at the bottom of the page.


Let's see how all this looks. Let me know if you have any questions.



Kind regards,

Jamie Shek
Director, Maker's Mark Creative



// M 0423 592 912
// E jamie@makersmarkcreative.com.au
// A Level 1, 616 Balcombe Road, Black Rock, 3193 VIC

Hi Jamie, 

When you have a moment, the filter is ready for your review, pending the client feedback on the bedroom count situation. Here is a link to the staging site: https://staging-visitlatitude25.kinsta.com/properties/ . 

Let us know what you think?

Hi Heath,

I'm waiting on confirmation from the client. I'll get back to you.


Kind regards,

Jamie Shek
Director, Maker's Mark Creative

Hi Jamie,

Thanks for the below, we will look into it. 

Question: with the homes that have 2 + 1 MPR, did you want us to count it as a 2 bedroom or 3 bedroom? (on the filter that is...)

Hi Heath,

Sounds great. Let's get cracking :)

I've been thinking about the map.

It might as simple as altering the Link attribute to auto populate with suggested pages/posts/properties much like way the tags work.

Perhaps we could easily write a function in the LAT25 plugin that can extend the Maps plugin.

What do you think?




Kind regards,

Jamie Shek
Director, Maker's Mark Creative

Hi Jamie, 

I had a chat to Joel, we can use the metadata fields as discussed in the same time frames. 

We will start on this tomorrow and have it to you by Friday on staging for you to review.

Hi Heath,

Thanks for the call. Let me know what Joel thinks :)



Kind regards,

Jamie Shek
Director, Maker's Mark Creative

Hi Jamie, 

Sure, we have done something like this a couple of times, so already know the best way to code it. We are thinking an ajax filter will be nice and fluid, i.e. as you click the check boxes the list of properties is refining in real-time. 

For the smaller screens when the columns start to stack, we recommend a dropdown button that says FILTER or REFINE or some verb link this and then on-click the filter slides down as you have designed. 

The task will take 3 hours in total, you have only used a couple of minutes this month out of your included 2 hours, so I'm to absorb the extra hour in your Nov period. Does that work for you?

And yes, feel free to give me a buzz if you want to have a chat.

Hi Heath,

We're looking to have some modifications done on the LAT25 properties page. Essentially, we're looking to create a more advanced filtering mechanism for the properties. Currently, its using the visual composer post grid widget with a custom grid format. I doubt we can extend the filter so we might have to look at a different way to do it.

See redesign attached. Can you give me buzz to discuss when you get a chance?


Kind regards,

Jamie Shek
Director, Maker's Mark Creative
